paper_title: Towards a full exceptional collection for the adjoint Grassmannian of type e6
abstract: We construct a Lefschetz exceptional collection of vector bundles in the bounded derived category of coherent sheaves of the adjoint/coadjoint Grassmannian of type $E_6$ of dimension $21$.
publication_venue: 19 pages, multiple Dynkin diagrams. This is very much still work in progress
